Directions for Use
Traditional Use:
1. Cover wheels with fabric flap and secure with hook-and-loop closures.

Backpack Use:
1. Cover wheels with fabric flap and secure with hook-and-loop closures.
2. Pull shoulder straps out of back pocket and clip buckles.

Rolling Use:
1. Unbuckle shoulder straps and tuck inside back pocket.
2. Uncover wheels by securing fabric flap to back of carrier with hook-and-loop closures.
3. Push button at top of handle to fully extend.

product_name: Snoozer® Lookout I Pet Car Seat
product_description:
product highlights

The Snoozer Lookout Car Seat gives your pet the perfect place to ride while on the move. Having your pet safely contained in the car seat is sure to provide a safe trip for all passengers- whether two or four legged.

Features:

  • Comfortable sherpa interior
  • Elevates pets 7 inches so that they can look out the window
  • Keeps pets restrained making for a safe ride for all passengers
  • Helps alleviate car sickness
  • Containment strap included

    Includes: 1 Seat
    Intended Pet(s): Dogs
    Material(s): Polyurethane foam form with cover made of quilted nylon, poly/cotton, or vinyl. Interior sitting area has faux lamb's wool material (polyester) for comfort.
    Color: Assorted colors; please choose from included color options
    Care Instructions: Cover is removable and machine washable and dryable. Wash in warm water and tumble dry on low heat.
    Directions:
    Place the Lookout on either the front or rear seat of your vehicle. It will be high enough so that when your pet is inside they will be able to look out the window and see what's happening outside. This keeps them interested in their ride and they won't want to climb on your shoulders or in your lap, making for a safer ride. Our customers also tell us that motion sickness has been reduced for many pets. Bring the car's shoulder strap and lap belt down through the open channel along the back of the Lookout seat and snap it into the seat belt receptacle. This fastens the Lookout to the car. For safety during sudden stops your pet should have a harness and be strapped into the Lookout. A containment strap is supplied with the Lookout. The hook end attaches to your harness's "D" ring and the other end clips around the lap belt. DO NOT ATTACH THE STRAP TO THE PET'S COLLAR. Adjust the harness so that your pet has movement but cannot get out of the Lookout. In the beginning your pet may move side to side. You can always put a safety pin through the supplied strap and the seat belt to keep the strap centered in the seat. It can be removed as your pet becomes accustomed to the Lookout (safety pin is not supplied).

    Your pet will quickly realize they can see out or sleep comfortably keeping both you and your pet safe during sudden stops. Use the Lookout at home or in hotels as your pet&339;s bed and then move it into the car for travel. Your pet will look forward to sleeping in it at night. Available in a variety of colors you are sure to find the perfect car seat to match your car, or your individual style.

    Sizing Guide: For help determining which size seat is best for your pet, we recommend cutting out a piece of newspaper to the interior dimensions of each seat and placing your pet on each. This will help determine what size would be most comfortable for your pet.

product_name: Snoozer® Console Lookout Pet Car Seat
product_description:
product highlights

The Snoozer Console Lookout Pet Car Seat with its patented design allows your pet to have the comfort and security of riding next to you while in the car. It attaches easily to your car's console, making the ride enjoyable and safe. The Snoozer Console Lookout is designed for pets up to 7 lb (small) or up to 12 lb (large SUV).Two sizes to choose from.

Features:

  • Comfortable Sherpa interior
  • Helps alleviate car sickness
  • Containment strap included
  • Keeps pets restrained making for a safe ride for all passengers

    Includes: 1 Seat
    Intended Pet(s): Dogs
    Material(s): Polyurethane foam form with cover made of quilted nylon, poly/cotton, or vinyl. Interior sitting area has faux lamb's wool material (polyester) for comfort.
    Color: Assorted colors; please choose from included color options
    Care Instructions: Machine washable cover
    Advice for Use:
    Open the containment straps and remove them from the safety strap loops. Thread it between the upper seat cushion and lower seat cushion on both the driver and passenger seats adjacent to the console. There should be a metal support that the containment strap can go around and then be re-connected making a circle. Another, perhaps better option for the containment strap could be the seat post on the floor of the vehicle again reconnecting to form a circle. Once in position you may chose to leave it there permanently.

    Place the seat on the console with the safety strap to the back end and the front strap facing forward. Lift the console lid and wrap the single front strap under the lid and tighten. When the console snaps shut this strap simply prevents the console from tilting and is not intended as security in braking or accidents.

    Next, open the containment straps previously installed and reattach them to the safety strap loops on the underside of the seat. Adjust the straps to tighten the seat to the console. Once the seat is in place, the clasp on the safety strap is attached to your pet by his HARNESS. DO NOT ATTACH TO A COLLAR. Tighten the safety strap to keep your pet in the seat until they realize its comfort.

    To remove the seat, simply open the buckle on the containment strap and remove the seat. Close the buckles and leave the containment straps in place for use later.

    Available Sizes
    Small: For Pets up to 7 lb, Interior sitting area measures 14 in L x 6 in W x 4 in H. Exterior dimensions of the product are 15 in L x 8.5 in W x 6 in H.
    Large: For Pets up to 12 lbs, Interior sitting area measures 16 in L x 9 in W x 4 in H. Exterior dimensions of the product are 19 in L x 12 in W x 7 in H.

    For help determining which size seat is best for your pet, we recommend cutting out a piece of newspaper to the interior dimensions of each seat and placing your pet on each. This will help determine what size would be most comfortable for your pet.

    Advice for Use:
    Place the Lookout on either the front or rear seat of your vehicle. Bring the car's shoulder strap and lap belt down through the open channel along the back of the Lookout seat and snap it into the seat belt receptacle. This fastens the Lookout to the car.

    For safety during sudden stops your pet should have a harness and be strapped into the Lookout. A containment strap is supplied with the Lookout. The hook end attaches to the "D" ring and the other end clips around the lap belt. DO NOT ATTACH THE STRAP TO THE PET'S COLLAR. Adjust the harness so that your pet has movement but cannot get out of the Lookout.

    In the beginning your pet may move side to side. You can always put a safety pin through the supplied strap and the seat belt to keep the strap centered in the seat. It can be removed as your pet becomes accustomed to the Lookout (safety pin is not supplied).Your pet will quickly realize they can see out or sleep comfortably, keeping both of you safe during sudden stops. Use the Lookout at home or in hotels as your pet's bed and then move it into the car for travel. Your pet will look forward to sleeping in it at night.

product_name: Snoozer® Luxury Console Lookout® Pet Car Seat
product_description:
product highlights

The Snoozer Luxury Console Lookout Pet Car Seat with its patented design allows your pet to have the comfort and security of riding next to you while in the car. It attaches easily to your car's console, making the ride enjoyable and safe.

Features: Comfortable foam foam;  Luxury microsuede cover with sherpa lined pad;  Machine washable cover;  Helps alleviate car sickness;  Containment strap included;  Keeps pets restrained making for a safe ride for all passengers
Includes: Safety containment strap
Color: Pink
Material: Microsuede cover- polyurethane foam form
Pet Size: Small
Capacity: For pets up to 12 lbs.
Interior Dimensions: 16"L x 9"W x 4"H (seating area)
Exterior Dimensions: 19"L x 12"W x 7"H
Weight: 3 Lbs
Cleaning Instructions: Remove cover and pad from foam form. Cover and pad are both machine washable. Hang dry.
Assembly Instructions or Directions: The Snoozer Luxury Console Lookout is designed for pets up to 7 pounds (small) or up to 12 lbs (large). Both are designed to let small pets ride up front, in comfort with their masters, while being protected against sudden breaking. Console seats are secured to the vehicle's console while the pet is attached with a safety strap from the seat to the pet's harness. Both seats have four straps: The safety strap, two containment straps and one front strap. The front strap goes under the lid of the console preventing the seat from tilting to the rear. The safety strap (which is centered and threaded into the rear of the console and is the connection point for the containment straps underneath) attaches the dog to the seat. The containment straps are the straps that anchor the seat to the car. INSTALLATION: Open the containment straps and remove them from the safety strap loops. Thread it between the upper seat cushion and lower seat cushion on both the driver and passenger seats adjacent to the console. There should be a metal support that the containment strap can go around and then be re-connected making a circle. Another, perhaps better option for the containment strap could be the seat post on the floor of the vehicle again reconnecting to form a circle. Once in position you may chose to leave it there permanently. Place the seat on the console with the safety strap to the back end and the front strap facing forward. Lift the console lid and wrap the single front strap under the lid and tighten. When the console snaps shut this strap simply prevents the console from tilting and is not intended as security in braking or accidents. Next, open the containment straps previously installed and reattach them to the safety strap loops on the underside of the seat. Adjust the straps to tighten the seat to the console. Once the seat is in place, the clasp on the safety strap is attached to your pet by his HARNESS. DO NOT ATTACH TO A COLLAR. Tighten the safety strap to keep your pet in the seat until they realize its comfort. To remove the seat, simply open the buckle on the containment strap and remove the seat. Close the buckles and leave the containment straps in place for use later.

Directions:
1. Place the back of the carrier against your chest with a strap over each shoulder.
2. Crisscross the straps on your back and securely fasten the buckles.
3. Adjust the straps so the carrier feels comfortably snug against your body, then fasten and tighten the waist strap.
4. Place your pet inside and immediately attach the safety strap to your pet's collar. Adjust the length of the safety strap for comfort.
5. Adjust the drawstring at the top of the pouch to secure your pet inside.

product_name: MidWest® Quiet Time Deluxe Divider Panels
product_description:
product highlights

Divider Panels are an important component of successful crate training. They're used to adjust the interior size of the crate as your dog grows. For Midwest Folding Crates.

When choosing a crate for your new puppy, you'll want to select one that will accommodate his full adult size. However, if the crate has too much room inside, your puppy may choose to relieve himself in one corner, and sleep in the other, which defeats one of the important principles of crate training. That's where a crate divider comes in. It lets you buy the right size crate, then adjust the interior space to grow with your puppy. For Midwest Folding Crates.

Includes: Divider Panels
Material: Metal

product_description:
product highlights

The Ovation single-door crate features the innovative, patent-pending Up & Away Door along with all of the features that are sought after in wire crates for dogs. To open the door, simply grab the comfort-grip handle and lift and lay the door on top of the crate. The Ovation Door stows out of the way, eliminating the need for additional space required for a swing-out, hinged door. To close, lift the door and lower into place while releasing the Safety Catch until the door reaches a closed position. The channel-track door frame adds significant strength and security to the crate, and the low threshold of the door allows your pet to enter the crate comfortably. With its fold & carry configuration, Ovation sets up and folds down in seconds without the need for tools. Ovation includes a composite plastic pan for easy cleanup in the event of an accident, plastic carrying handles to move the folded crate from one location to another comfortably, surface protective rubber feet, and most importantly, a free divider panel for use while your puppy grows into his adult-size home.

Backpack Use:
1. Cover wheels with fabric flap and secure with hook-and-loop closures.

Rolling Use:

3. Push button at top of handle to fully extend.

product_name: PetSafe® Freedom® Patio Panel Pet Doors
product_description:
product highlights

  • Pet door installs into sliding glass doors
  • Easy to install
  • Fully insulated
This pet door conveniently installs in minutes into your sliding glass doors.

Features:

  • Panels for sliding glass doors 91 7/8 to 96" tall (prior to purchasing a panel, determine height of your sliding glass door frame opening. Measure from the highest point in upper track to lowest point in lower track)
  • Heavy-duty aluminum construction with a super-hard powder coat finish that will not corrode
  • Installs in left or right closing/sliding doors--has reversible lock
  • Energy conserving UltraSeal flap
  • Insulated and locking closing panel
  • Spring loaded self-adjusting design installs with no cutting required
  • Shatter-resistant, tempered safety glass
  • Latch lock assembly enables sliding glass door to lock
  • Includes glass sweep and weather stripping
  • Adjustable Height: 91 7/16" to 96" Tall
  • Rise: 1 3/4"
  • Flap Opening Size: 8 1/4" X 12 3/16"
  • Outer Frame Size: 11 3/18" X 91 7/16" X 96"

Includes:

  • (1x) PetSafe Deluxe Patio Panel
  • (1x) Panel latch assembly
  • (1x) Roll foam weather stripping
  • (1x) Glass sweep
  • (1x) Closing panel
  • (6x) #6 x 5/8" sheet metal screws
  • (4x) #6 x 3/4" flat head metal sheet screws
  • (1x) 7/64" drill bit
  • (1x) Installation guide

Tools required for installation:

  • Electric drill
  • 1/8" (3 mm) Drill bit
  • 7/32" (5.6 mm) Drill bit
  • Phillips head screwdriver
  • Flat head screwdriver
  • Scissors
  • Pencil

Assembly and installation:
To install the panel into your sliding glass door track:

Step 1. Set the panel in the sliding glass door track. Place the top of the panel in the top door track groove. Compress the spring-loaded height adjuster by pushing the panel up and placing the bottom of the panel into the corresponding bottom track groove.

Step 2. Fit the panel into place. Slide the panel against the door jam. There should be no gaps between the door jam and the panel. Your sliding glass door should butt flush against the panel when closed.
Note: Your sliding glass door and the panel must butt flush on the inside of your home in order for the panel latch to work properly.

Step 3. Secure the height adjuster to the panel. Test and make sure you are satisfied with the fit of the panel and how it works in conjunction with your sliding glass door. Drill 1/8" (3 mm) holes through the 4 pre drilled holes (2 each side) on the height adjuster. Fasten the height adjuster to the panel with the (4) 1/4" (6 mm) sheet metal screws provided.

Step 4. Secure the panel to the sliding glass door frame. Drill (2) 1/8" (3mm) holes through the top and (2) 1/8" (3 mm) holes through the bottom of the panel and into the door frame. Fasten the panel to the door frame with the (4) 5/8" (16 mm) sheet metal screws provided.

View the Assembly Instructions

product_name: High Tech Pet® Power Pet™ Automatic Pet Door
product_description:
product highlights

  • Fully automatic, motor driven door opens completely under its own power
  • Door is activated by an ultrasonic pet collar
  • Four access modes give you complete control

A fully automatic, motor driven door that opens completely under its own power. The door is activated by an ultrasonic pet collar. Features an attractive, translucent Lexan door panel that quickly and quietly powers upward, disappearing into the slim, stylish housing.

  • Has an automatic, dead bolt locking feature that guards against would-be intruders. Only the coded signal from your pet's collar will open the door.
  • Has a directional sensing system that operates a motor drive, fully automatic panel--opening only when your pet is on a direct approach, not just when wandering by or when sitting or sleeping next to the door.
  • Operates on a standard AC wall adapter with a 6 ft cord (included) or optional 12 volt rechargeable battery (sold separately).
  • Has four access modes: in only, out only, in and out or closed and locked.
  • Manual open/close buttons.
  • Automatic battery power monitoring.
  • The dual range controls allow you to adjust separate activation distances for inside and outside your home.
  • Comes with one thin and lightweight battery-powered ultrasonic collar (additional collars sold separately). Each collar uses one type 2430 lithium battery (included). The one size collar fits any size pet from kitten to St. Bernard.
  • Operates on the safe principle of gravity closure with an automatic safety retraction system to provide an extra level of safety by causing the lightweight panel to instantly retract if it encounters an obstruction during closure.
  • Door is as easy to install as any conventional pet door. They are flush mounted units that require the same size opening as a regular pet door. A self-framing kit is included for door installations.
  • Medium Dimensions: 12" x 28.5" x 2"

product_name: Richell® Freestanding Tall Pet Gate
product_description:
product highlights

  • Made from rubberwood and timber
  • Freestanding gate keeps puppies to medium adult pets contained
  • Perfect for use in any home space
  • Self supporting; requires no installation; adjustable width
  • Rubber feet protect floor surfaces
  • Side panels fold back for easy storage or transport
  • 90-day manufacturer warranty
At Richell USA, we utilize beautiful rubberwood in the design and construction of our pet products. We selected this particular timber as our signature wood because of its high durability and tight grain, which takes beautifully to a wide range of finishes. The wood also has the ability to minimize shrinkage, cracks and warps, making it the perfect candidate for the production of high-quality pet products.

Rubberwood is best known for the production of latex, which is used worldwide for rubber-based products. So while other trees are cut down for the sole purpose of producing certain products, rubberwood is used only after it completes its latex-producing cycle and dies, which generally lasts 26-30 years. This is another reason why Richell loves this timber!

  • Pencil
  • Safety Glasses

Assembly and installation:
To install the panel into your sliding glass door track:

Step 1. Set the panel in the sliding glass door track. Place the top of the panel in the top door track groove. Compress the spring-loaded height adjuster by pushing the panel up and placing the bottom of the panel into the corresponding bottom track groove.

Step 2. Fit the panel into place.Slide the panel against the door jam. There should be no gaps between the door jam and the panel. Your sliding glass door should butt flush against the panel when closed.
Note: Your sliding glass door and the panel must butt flush on the inside of your home in order for the panel latch to work properly.

Step 3. Secure the height adjuster to the panel. Test and make sure you are satisfied with the fit of the panel and how it works in conjunction with your sliding glass door. Drill 1/8" (3 mm) holes through the 4 pre drilled holes (2 each side) on the height adjuster. Fasten the height adjuster to the panel with the (4) 1/4" (6 mm) sheet metal screws provided.

Step 4. Secure the panel to the sliding glass door frame. Drill (2) 1/8" (3mm) holes through the top and (2) 1/8" (3 mm) holes through the bottom of the panel and into the door frame. Fasten the panel to the door frame with the (4) 5/8" (16 mm) sheet metal screws provided.

View the Assembly Instructions

product_name: Richell® Freestanding Tall Pet Gate
product_description:
product highlights

  • Made from rubberwood and timber
  • Freestanding gate keeps puppies to medium adult pets contained
  • Perfect for use in any home space
  • Self supporting; requires no installation; adjustable width
  • Rubber feet protect floor surfaces
  • Side panels fold back for easy storage or transport
  • 90-day manufacturer warranty
At Richell USA, we utilize beautiful rubberwood in the design and construction of our pet products. We selected this particular timber as our signature wood because of its high durability and tight grain, which takes beautifully to a wide range of finishes. The wood also has the ability to minimize shrinkage, cracks and warps, making it the perfect candidate for the production of high-quality pet products.

Rubberwood is best known for the production of latex, which is used worldwide for rubber-based products. So while other trees are cut down for the sole purpose of producing certain products, rubberwood is used only after it completes its latex-producing cycle and dies, which generally lasts 26-30 years. This is another reason why Richell loves this timber!

product_name: High Tech Pet® Humane Electronic Dog Fence
product_description:
product highlights

Advanced electronic fence system from High Tech Pet features state of the art technology that provides gradual electronic stimulation for quick, humane training. Its multi-functional rechargeable collar operates with all PAW (Pet Automated World) products including the Power Pet door and the Sound Barrier Indoor Sonic Fence (each sold separately).This electronic fence has a Pulsed Proportional Stimulus system that offers quick, humane training. This system continuously increases sound and shock pulse as the dog moves toward the boundary. Features a multi-functional rechargeable collar that operates with all PAW (Pet Automated World) products including the Power Pet door and the Sound Barrier Indoor Sonic Fence (each sold separately). Your pets can operate all three products from a single collar. Use this fence as a great stand-alone electronic containment system, or use it with other PAW products now or in the future. The collar is slim, lightweight and comfortable on your pet. It is fully waterproof and rechargeable. Includes a special heavy-duty Ultra Wire made of the highest quality solid core copper with a special insulating material that stands up to the elements.

System includes:
Transmitter, collar, collar charger, 500 feet of Ultra-Wire, 50 flags, wire splices, mounting hardware and AC adapters for transmitter and rechargeable battery. Maximum 50 acre range with the purchase of additional wire.

How it works
The collar features the Pulsed Proportional Stimulus system to humanely contain your pet. A computer chip inside the collar detects the distance of your pet from the boundary wire. It applies a combination of sound and shock, proportionately increasing as your pet approaches the boundary.

Collar features:

  • Ultra-light (weighs only 1.3 oz) and comfortable for your pet
  • Built-In Stimulus Test Lamp* with Test Button
  • Waterproof Tone Speaker produces a loud tone and is fullywaterproof.
  • Operating Status LED: Auto flash = All Okay
  • Super Strong Molded Strap**
  • Ultrasonic Multi-Function Transmitter controls everything! Operates pet door, ultra sonic barriers, and Humane Contain systems
  • Solid Copper Stimulus Probes
  • Extra Rugged, Fully Waterproof Casing
  • Rechargeable

* This feature allows you to check that the shock is working. Take the collar into the radio field and push the "Stimulus Test" button. This diverts the shock energy from the stimulus probes to the test lamp.
** The strap is made of an almost indestructible, comfortable poly-elastomer strap

Transmitter features:

  • Waterproof

As your dog approaches the boundary wire, the collar will beep and vibrate when he enters the warning zone. If he proceeds further, he receives a harmless but unpleasant shock to contain him in the area that you have established. The Free Spirit In-Ground Fence can be used with pets over 5 lb.

If your dog continues past the warning zone, the collar will deliver a harmless but unpleasant correction at the level you determine works best for your dog

product_name: PetSafe® Pawz Away® Outdoor Pet Barrier
product_description:
product highlights

The Pawz Away Outdoor Pet Barrier is disguised as a rock that blends seamlessly into your landscape. It teaches your pet to avoid areas in your landscape using static correction. Place the Outdoor Pet Barrier near anything you want your pet to avoid. Designed as a rock, the Pawz Away Outdoor Pet Barrier blends seamlessly into your landscape. No more getting into trash, jumping in pools or ponds, digging in flower beds and more. An electronic signal creates areas that are off-limits for your pet. For use with pets 5 lbs. and over.

How It Works
The Barrier Transmitter, disguised as a rock in your landscape, sends a spherical radio signal to your pet's receiver collar. When your pet enter the Barrier Area, he'll hear audible tones from the receiver collar and he will feel a safe, progressive static correction, delivered through the contact points on his neck. The progressive static correction may startle your pet, but will not cause harm. He'll quickly associate the unpleasant correction with the area you've declared off-limits.

Wireless Option
Quick and easy set-up; just place the rock and set the range, covers up to 16 feet in diameter.

Wire Option
Create a custom shaped barrier using up to 150 feet of wire (sold separately).

Features:

  • Quick and easy wireless option protects area up to 16 feet in diameter
  • Disguised as a rock
  • Create a custom shaped barrier using up to 150 feet of boundary wire (sold separately)
  • Lightweight Receiver Collar with Progressive Static Correction
  • Adjustable collar fits pets 5 lbs. or more with neck sizes 6" to 28"
  • Additional dogs can be added to the system with Add-A-Dog Extra Receiver Collars
  • Quick and easy set-up and training

product_name: High Tech Pet® Humane Contain Electronic Dog Fence Super System
product_description:
product highlights

The New Humane Contain Electronic Fence Super System brings you ultra advanced technology at a value price providing secure, reliable and humane dog containment. Includes everything you need: TX-7 transmitter, RC-7 radio collar, 500 feet Ultra-Wire, 50 boundary flags, 5 wire splices, long and short hair probes, step-by-step installation and training manual.Features the proprietary pulsed proportional stimulus systemâ¢ which sets the humane contain brand apart from all other electronic dog fences. New, ultra-slim, fully RC-7 radio collar is fully waterproof and comes with an attractive, yet ultra-tough poly-elastomer strap. State-of-the-art, TX-7 transmitter features all digital, coded signals to eliminate false triggers and includes audible and visual wire break alarms. Unique, current controlled power lets you add enough wire to encompass up to 30 acres while maintaining precise control of your field width (sometimes a problem with inferior systems). Custom engineered, Ultra-Wireâ¢ is thicker overall and stronger than even heavy duty 18-gauge burial-grade wire. Its special high-strength coating is resistant to sunlight, moisture and ground rot. Its extremely high pull-strength resists wire breaks. Best of all, the revolutionary pulsed proportional stimulus system delivers sound and shock stimulus based upon your pet's exact distance from the boundary wire. Competing systems sometimes deliver too much or too little stimulus. But with the HC-7000, stimulus bursts come faster as your pet moves closer to the boundary allowing your pet to decide how much stimulus he is required to initiate the retreat behavior for the most effective, humane and reliable containment.
  • Developed in collaboration with several of the nation's leading animal behaviorists
  • No manual stimulus adjustment is required
  • No warning or correction zones
  • Automatic and self adjusting to your dog's behavior
  • Automatic run-through prevention
  • Extra loud training tones follow the stimulus pulse rate for a Pavlov type of enhanced boundary training
  • Resulting in shorter training time and a better trained dog
  • Receiver includes built-in battery tester to let you know when it's time to change batteries
  • Just push the test button to insure that the stimulus is working
  • For all dogs 5 - 200 lbs
  • Model HC-7000

product_name: SportDOG Brand® In-Ground Fence™ System
product_description:
product highlights

The SportDOG Brand In-Ground Fence is a containment system that includes everything you need to contain your dog in 1 1/3 acres of land or less, with the capability to contain up to 100 acres with additional Wire & Flag Kits. Set up the system by burying the included wire around your containment area, plugging the wires into your Fence Transmitter, and adjusting the settings to your unique yard. Train your dog by using the included flags to create a temporary, visual boundary, and by following the easy, step-by-step instructions in the training manual.

Your dog will learn that when approaching the boundary, the waterproof Collar Receiver will first send a warning tone and vibration, that will move to a static stimulation to deter any further steps made towards the edge of the containment area. After setup and training is complete, have confidence your dog is contained with features such as anti-linger to prevent your dog from draining the replaceable Collar Receiver battery, and a wire break alarm to let you know if anything happens to the Boundary Wire.

Features:

  • Waterproof Collar Receiver features 4 levels of static stimulation, as well as vibration/tone; Fits dogs 10 pounds or larger
  • Fence Transmitter features built-in lightning protection and wire-break alarm for added safety

product highlights

Bluefang X-22 is a complete electronic fence kit with remote training and bark. Bluefang technology lets you control your dog's collar with your iPhone or Android from 400 ft. Comes with BF-22 collar, transmitter, 500' of ultra-wire, 50 flags, waterproof splices and mounting hardware. The perimeter is expandable to 50 acres with purchase of additional wire. Pulsed Proportional Stimulus prevents run-through by automatically increasing stimulus as your dog moves toward the boundary for the most effective and humane electronic dog fence made. Remote training uses positive tones to quickly and easily teach "good dog" behaviors such as sit, stay, come and heel. 3 corrective stimulus levels deter "bad dog" behaviors like jumping, chewing, and digging. Add an unlimited number of collars and customize the stimulus intensity and duration of each level for each individual dog. Bark stopping function distinguishes between nuisance barking and intruder/ alarm barking. 3 Bark Control Modes: "Stop Only Nuisance Barking", "Stop All Barking" and "Stop Barking and Howling". 3 corrective stimulus modes, "Sound Only", "Stimulus Only" and "Sound Plus Stimulus". The "Sound Only" mode uses painless sound to gently but, effectively deter. The quicker-acting static stimulus modes use a warning tone followed by harmless static stimulus that starts out mild and increases if barking persists. The Most Ingenious Pet Products on the Planet.

Features: Includes everything you need to Train, Contain and Control Dog Barking with Your Cell Phone, Up to 400 ft. Range. Has new firmware download feature. product_name: High Tech Pet® Radio Mat Scat Pad & Radio Dog Containment Collar Kit
product_description:
product highlights

Used as a stand-alone training system or as a great accessory to any Humane Contain series Electronic fence system, the Radio Mat is an electronic scat pad that triggers stimulus at your dog's receiver collar whenever he touches the pad. Use it to keep your dog away from the trash, off of furniture, out of an entire room and away from any area you wish to make "Off Limits to Dogs!" At the touch of a paw, the pad, it sends a radio signals to the RC-8 receiver collar (included) that emits a harmless, but unpleasant shock stimulus to make your dog scat. Only dogs wearing the collar are affected. No need to worry about small children or unsuspecting guests touching the pad and receiving the shock. Also includes Sound Blast feature, in which the pad itself emits a loud sonic blast at the touch of a paw. Use the sound to reinforce the shock stimulus or all by itself for painless area restriction training of cats and dogs. No collar is required to operate the sound blast feature so, you may use this feature to keep your kitties and other pets at bay without the need of a collar.

  • 3 modes of operation: shock only, sound only and shock and sound together
  • Gives you a complete, versatile area restriction training system in one convenient product
  • Keeps pets off furniture, away from doorways, trash cans and anywhere else that's off limits to pets
  • Standard collar also works with any humane contain electronic pet fence
  • Includes transmitter pad and RC-8A radio collar, collar battery
  • Water resistant and stain resistant

30.375"L x 29.625"W

When choosing a crate for your new puppy, you'll want to select one that will accommodate his full adult size. However, if the crate has too much room inside, your puppy may choose to relieve himself in one corner, and sleep in the other, which defeats one of the important principles of crate training. That's where a crate divider comes in. It lets you buy the right size crate, then adjust the interior space to grow with your puppy. For Midwest Folding Crates.

product_name: Precision Pet Courtyard Kennel
product_description:
product highlights

Why the courtyard kennel?
  • Keeps pets away from danger and gives them a "yard"" of their own
  • No exposed screws, wires or pins to injure your pet
  • Provides breathing room and visibility for your pet
  • Offers an easy way to manage your pet regardless of your surroundings
  • Easy to transport, setup and take down
  • Includes six 3 ft.-wide panels totaling 18 ft. in length
The panels are constructed of durable, rust-resistant galvanized steel with a decorative silver crackle finish.

The set also contains a set of long and short removable corner pins. The long pins stake the kennel into soft ground, and the short pins can be used to assemble the kennel on hard surfaces.

The pins slide-down design allows for quick assembly with no other tools required, and they allow for panels to be easily added or removed to adjust the size and configuration of the kennel. By removing a pin, the Courtyard Kennel can be easily transformed to portable 18-foot fence. And, since the panels can be separated with the simple removal of a pin, the Courtyard Kennel can be disassembled flat for easy storage.

Measures 38"W x 38"H

product highlights

Give your pet a place to escape the elements with TRIXIE's Dog's Inn Dog House. Our solid pine construction and use of the finest materials means this shelter will endure years of use with very little maintenance. Benefits include a draft resistant tongue-and-groove exterior that is finished out with a weatherproof sealer both inside and out. The hinged roof is covered with durable composite shingles, with locking arm opens one side for ventilation. Charming window shutters with latch for air circulation. The adjustable, extra-high plastic-tipped feet allow you to level the house on uneven ground. This will help keep the floor cool in the summer and warm/dry in the winter. TRIXIE has also provided a removable floor for easy cleaning, a unique feature not found in many other dog houses. This shelter is suitable for medium/large breed dogs weighing up to 70 lbs. (ex: Border Collie or Labrador).

Features: Solid pine construction; shuttered windows; draft-resistant tongue-and-groove design; weatherproof sealer both inside and out; durable composite roof singles; hinged roof with locking arm opens on one side; raised floor to promote circulation to help keep floor warm/dry; adjustable feet to level on uneven ground; hard-plastic leg protectors prevent decay

product_name: Sunbeam® Heated Cuddler Pet Bed
product_description:
product highlights

Provide your pet with soothing comfort and warmth with the Sunbeam Heating Pet Pad, ideal for those cold winter nights. Exclusively at PetSmart.

Safety Instructions:
1. Do not use this product for other than its intended purpose.
2. Discard this pad if it shows any sign of deterioration.
3. Use only with supplemental cover recommended in the instruction manual.
4. Do not puncture pad.
5. Do not fold pad.
6. Position power cord so that it prevents entanglement with pet.
7. Do not use pins or other metallic means to fasten this pad in place.
8. Never pull this pad by the power cord. Do not use the power cord as a handle. Unplug when not in use.
9. Fabric cover is machine washable, hang to dry before use.
10. Not for use on humans.

Operating Instructions:
1. Unzip the cover completely, exposing the foam padding.
2. Insert PVC pet heat pad into fabric cover placing between the foam. None of the pet heat pad should be visible when the zipper is closed.
3. Connect the power cord by plugging the cord into a standard wall outlet, 120VAC, 60Hz.

Cleaning Instructions:
1. Unplug the power cord from the wall outlet.
2. Remove foam from fabric cover.
3. Remove PVC heat pet pad from fabric cover as this is NOT for machine wash; wipe clean by hand only.
4. Machine wash the fabric cover only on gentle cycle with a mild detergent. Air dry only.

Warning:
Risk of electrical shock, read all instructions before using this product! Set to the veterinary recommended temperature of 102.5 F.

Bed Type: Heated
Features: Great for cold nights, Soft removable microplush cover is machine washable, Can be used with any style pet bed, Comforting warmth - great for aging pets or pets that require additional warmth, For indoor & Household use only.
Color: Tan
Environment: Indoor
Pet Size: Mini
Interior Material: PVC Heat Pad & Foam
Exterior Material: Soft Microplush

product highlights

This stroller features an extra-wide carriage for both single and multiple pets, and its No-ZIP technology means no fumbling with zippers while trying to gain access to your pet. A plush bolster pad and weather cover ensure a comfortable environment for your pet no matter the weather conditions, while a panoramic view window provides an all-encompassing view of his surroundings.

product_name: Pet Life All-In-One Pet Stroller & Car Seat
product_description:
product highlights

Pet Life All-in-1 Dog Stroller, Carrier & Car Seat The Pet Life All -in-1 Dog Stroller, Dog Stroller Carrier and Car Seat is composed of high-grade, heavy duty ballistic nylon fabrics and tough PVC handle-bars that are meant to stroll up to 70 Lbs of weight. This Dog Stroller features high-quality dual front rubberized wheels built for traction and a built-in bottom tray for placing any and all added belongings. This Pet Stroller features a zip-off mesh and nylon covering for pet peakage and a dual bottle tray within the push handle bar. The nylon component within the Dog Stroller easily unstraps and can be converted into both a Pet Carrier and a Car Seat. The Car Seat functionality sits onto any car seat and fastens to any and all vehicle seat belts. This piece is the ultimate safety component for your pet. Included inside of the Pet Stroller is a built-In leash and harness connector. These car seats are extremely essential while driving your pet in any car by further decreasing any and all car related injuries that occur every second each day. Many Pet Parents don't tend to focus on the protection of their pets while traveling in a vehicle and an item of such should be an essential requirement for all Pet Parents alike. The Handle Bars Fold and Collapse to 6 inches thin for storage purposes.

Features: Multi-purpose, 3-N-1 travel companion
Includes: 1 All-in-1 Dog Stroller, Carrier and Car Seat
Color: Gray, pink and black
Material: Mesh and Nylon
Pet Size: Small and Medium
Stroller Dimensions: 30.3" L x 19.8" W x 35.5" H
Carrier/Car Seat Dimensions: 19.69" L x 12.6" W x 14.17" H
Cleaning Instructions: Dry clean.

product_name: Pet Gear AT3 NO-ZIP Pet Stroller
product_description:
product highlights

Our new AT3 NO-ZIP Pet stroller is the perfect option for taking your pet wherever you go; from strolling through your neighborhood to the rougher terrain found on your favorite walking or jogging trail. No zippers means no hassle when trying to open and close the stroller. Our new NO-ZIP technology means that you can easily gain access to your pet without fumbling with difficult zippers! The AT3 NO-ZIP Pet Stroller also features an elevated paw rest. Your pet can easily look out of the stroller by using the front bar for support. This stroller navigates over rough terrain with ease, whether jogging or strolling, thanks to the front locking wheel. Speaking of strolling, the new panoramic view window allows your pet to remain safe inside of the stroller without missing any sights along the way!

Features: Easy-locking, No-zip entry;  Elevated paw rest with panoramic view window;  Front wheel fixed and swivels;  12" E.V.A. tires;  Large storage basket;  Parent tray for keys, water, etc.;  One hand, easy-fold mechanism;  Ergonomic handle

product_name: Drymate® Woof Cycle Dog Bike Trotter
product_description:
product highlights

The Drymate Woof Cycle Bike Trotter is an attachment that connects to your bicycle and is a great way to exercise your dog and release some energy, especially for active dogs. This great product allows you to safely exercise your dog at a trot while riding your bike. The design takes into account both the laws of physics and dog behavior, greatly reducing your dog's ability to pull to the side and virtually eliminating the tipping force.

Features:

  • Safely exercise your dog while riding your bike
  • Keeps your dog by your side while out of harm's way
  • Safety in design
  • Easy to install
  • Quick flip removal
  • Strong construction
  • When not in use, can be rotated up for easy storage or removed quickly

    Includes:

  • Pin: ¼ in steel pin-keeps arm attached to bike attachment
  • Bike attachment: made out of a specially blended resin providing maximum durability
  • Arm: made out of flexible resin to give dog and rider comfort
  • Leash: strongnylon webbing with durable clip

    Intended Pet(s): Dogs
    Color: Green
    Dimensions: 22 in L x 6 in W x 1.5 in H
    Capacity: For dogs from 10 to 90 lb

    Caution: To be used on non-motorized bikes only. Consider dog's safety in extreme temperature ranges. For the safety of dog and rider, the Bike Trotter should be used by adults only.

    Installation:

  • 1. Remove outer bolt from back axle of bike.
  • 2. On the Bike trotter, remove quick connect pin and separate bike attachment from trotter bar.
  • 3. Slide bike attachment over tire's axle and tighten outer bolt over it until secure.
  • 4. Slide trotter bar over bike attachment and line up holes.
  • 5. Insert quick connect pin though holes and pull double wire over pin to secure it.

    When not in use, the Bike Trotter can be rotated up for easy storage or removed by removing the quick connect pin. Bike attachment can also remain on bike.
